column1: #text=Last summer I decided to go to Mexico with my cousins .
#text=It was a nice vacation and we were very excited to go .
#text=In order to get to Mexico , we had to fly a plane .
#text=I have no issues flying a plane .
#text=I usually fly it constantly when I visit my friends in Florida .
#text=My cousins , on the other hand , were n't too keen on flying .
#text=They were very nervous on the plane .
#text=The food we received helped calm their nerves .
#text=Eating distracted them a little from our environment .
#text=Everything was fine until the plane started to experience a lot of turbulence .
#text=My cousins started to get afraid again .
#text=In fact , the turbulence was so bad , I started to feel afraid as well .
#text=Soon , the pilot announced that there was nothing to worry about .
#text=A couple minutes later , the plane flew smoothly again .
#text=Eight hours later , we arrived at Mexico .
#text=We were not only excited to be in Mexico , but we were excited to be on solid ground again .
